function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neglect of surveillance activities leading to increase in HAT cases","Impact":"Increase in cases of Human African Trypanosomiasis (HAT)","Mitigation":"Renewed efforts to eliminate T. b. gambiense and T. b. rhodesiense HAT through reduction of the parasite reservoir using screening and treatment of humans, as well as vector control","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for tracking disease spread and vector control technologies","People":"Population in areas affected by HAT","Owner":"Health authorities and organizations"},{"Description":"Scaling down of tsetse control campaigns leading to increase in HAT cases","Impact":"Increase in cases of Human African Trypanosomiasis (HAT)","Mitigation":"Renewed efforts to eliminate T. b. gambiense and T. b. rhodesiense HAT through reduction of the parasite reservoir using screening and treatment of humans, as well as vector control","Technologies":"Tsetse control technologies and surveillance technology","People":"Population in areas affected by HAT","Owner":"Health authorities and organizations"},{"Description":"Delay in eliminating transmission of HAT by 2030","Impact":"Prolonged risk of Human African Trypanosomiasis (HAT) transmission","Mitigation":"Adherence to the WHO roadmap and accelerated implementation of elimination strategies","Technologies":"Disease monitoring and transmission control technologies","People":"Population at risk of HAT transmission","Owner":"Health authorities and organizations"}]}
